name.jp: クリティカルダメージ追加の秘薬

description.en: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.ar: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.br: Esta mistura escura deixa você com sede de sangue, aumentando o dano de acertos críticos em +10% durante 30 minutos.
description.cns: 这个黑暗的混合物使你变得嗜血，暴击伤害+10%。持续30分钟。
description.de: Mysteriöse Medizin, welche den kritischen Schaden um 10% erhöht. Hält 30 Minuten.
description.fi: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.fil: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.fr: Potion augmentant les dégâts des coups critiques de 10% pendant 30 min.
description.id: Ramuan gelap ini membuatmu jadihaus darah, meningkatkan damage tambahan dari Critical sebesar +10% selama 30 menit.
description.it: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.jp: クリティカルヒット時のダメージを+10％増加します。効果時間30分間。
description.kr: 이 어두운 혼합물은 피에 굶주려 치명타의 추가 피해를 +10% 증가시킵니다. 30 분 동안 지속됩니다.
description.nl: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.pl: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.ru: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.sp: Este brebaje oscuro te vuelve sediento de sangre y aumenta el Daño Adicional de los Golpes Críticos en +10%. Dura 30 minutos.
description.sw: This dark concoction makes you blood-thirsty, increasing additional damage of critical hits by +10%. Lasts 30 minutes.
description.th: ส่วนผสมแห่งความมืดนี้ทำให้คุณกระหายเลือด เพิ่มความเสียหายเพิ่มเติมจากการโจมตีคริติคอล +10% เวลา 30 นาที
description.tw: 這個黑暗的混合物讓你嗜血，30 分鐘內，發動爆擊時追加爆擊傷害 +10%。
description.vi: Hỗn hợp hắc ám này khiến bạn khát máu, tăng thêm 10% sát thương của các đòn chí mạng. Kéo dài 30 phút.
